channel.title: Need help with npc ints

item.title: Need help with npc ints
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

I added a new npc to my client, when I went to test it, I got disconnected and my client said this:
then I was able to log back in, but now the npc is screwed up:
It’s supposed to be a skeleton mage that wears a dragon dagger, gloves, boots and RED zamorak robes, but instead of the robes it wears a dwarf head… Also it’s name is Gnome baller and the examine says: A professional gnome baller.

Here are the ints: if(i == 452) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[7]; int changedColors = 1; class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 386; class5.anIntArray94[1] = 539; class5.anIntArray94[2] = 356; class5.anIntArray76[3] = 61; class5.anIntArray70[3] = 937; class5.anIntArray94[3] = 348; class5.anIntArray76[4] = 61; class5.anIntArray70[4] = 937; class5.anIntArray94[4] = 265; class5.anIntArray76[5] = 61; class5.anIntArray70[5] = 937; class5.anIntArray94[5] = 170; class5.anIntArray70[6] = 361; class5.aString65 = "Barrow Wight"; class5.anInt61 = 85; class5.aByteArray89 = "It's going to murder me!".getBytes(); }
Can someone fix this that it wears Red zamorak robes and the name and examines are right?

Read full topic
